name: Pizza
ingredients:
2 ½ cups warm water
2 teaspoons active dry yeast
7 cups all-purpose flour
6 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil
1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt
 1 cup tomatoe sauce
2cups of cheese
2 cups of your choice of vegetables
instructions:
1.Bloom the yeast by sprinkling the sugar and yeast in the warm water. Let sit for 10 minutes, until bubbles form on the surface.
In a large bowl, combine the flour and salt. Make a well in the middle and add the olive oil and bloomed yeast mixture. Using a spoon, mix until a shaggy dough begins to form.
Preheat the oven as high as your oven will allow, between 450-500˚F (230-260˚C). Place a pizza stone, heavy baking sheet (turn upside down so the surface is flat), or cast iron skillet in the oven.
 Meanwhile, make the tomato sauce: Add the salt to the can of tomatoes and puree with an immersion blender, or transfer to a blender or food processor, and puree until smooth.

name: Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies
description: No Bake Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies
ingredients:
1 cup chocolate chips
1 cup natural creamy peanut butter
3 cups rolled oats
instructions:
1.Melt Chocolate
2.Mix peanut butter and chocolate together
3.Stir in oats
Scoop out 2 tbsp dough and form into ball
Place cookies onto parchment paper

name: Grilled Pineapple
instructions:
1.Cut pineaplle into chunks
2.Place chunks on skewer
3.Grill at 350 F for 10 minutes

name: Root Beer Float
ingredients:
1 cup root beer
 1 scoop vanilla ice cream
instructions:
1.Place root beer into glass
2.Add scoop of vanilla ice cream

name: Frozen Honey
instructions:
1.Place honey in desired container
2.Freeze for atleast 10 hours and enjoy

name: Spicy Edamame
ingredients:
1 cup edamae
2 tbsp chili garlic sauce
1/2tbsp sesame oil
instructions:
1.In a small fry pan on medium low heat add the sesame oil
2.Add chile garlic sauce and remove pan from heat
3.Stir in edamame
